page.title: 18EVENTS IN ASHBY MAGNA
page.content:
Functions like the Harvest Supper, Autumn Bazaar, auctions and the Annual Flower Show are well attended and the proceeds help with the upkeep of the village hall. The hall was purchased from the church commissioners in l978 by the villagers who are responsible for it upkeep.
During the month of June a Garden Fete is held at Manor Farm. This incorporates a gymkhana, dog show, sheep dog trials, and last year a church flower festival, and many traditional side shows.
The Women's Institute have this year held a Valentine Supper, a sponsored knit-in, and go carol singing every year, all in aid of charity.
